t: What are some healthy and natural brands of dog food available on Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer: Look for foods that have protein (and where the protein’s from) as the top ingredient. Stay away from foods that have grains in them. Make sure you read the label before buying and the freshness dates as well. Stay away from Kibbles n Bits, Purina and others like these brands.

t: Meet the dogs of Amazon
s: More than 10,000 dogs are registered to come to work at Amazon. Meet some of the dogs who help make Amazon a great place to work.

t: Meet one of Amazon's first employees, a corgi named Rufus
s: July 12, 2024 - Rufus' human parents remember life with Amazon's first canine staffer. ... More than 10,000 dogs join employees at Amazon offices today, but back in 1996 there was only one: a Welsh corgi named Rufus who roamed the first warehouse and loved meetings.

s: March 28, 2022 - Yes, the dogs that appear on Amazon's error pages are real dogs—and they're an important part of Amazon's company culture!

t: The Dog Park - Amazon Puget Sound Headquarters Tour
s: Explore the Dog Park on Amazon's Puget Sound Tour. A centrally located playground for our furry coworkers. Discover the legacy of Rufus, a Welsh corgi owned by one of our first engineers. Join the tail-wagging adventure now.

t: Meet some of the dogs who help make Amazon a great place to work

t: Alexa, how many dogs come to work at Amazon Seattle? 7,000 - Los Angeles Times
s: July 26, 2019 - At Amazon's Seattle headquarters, there is one dog for every seven workers, and bountiful dogs in the office may be the ultimate workplace perk.

t: The story behind the dog photos on Amazon’s Prime Day 404 error pages
s: July 18, 2018 - When many shoppers logged on during the first several hours of Amazon Prime Day, they were met with 404 error pages featuring photos of different dogs.
